fields.__EMPTY_1: Reservation not found at check-in
fields.__EMPTY_2: 1. Call Supplier, 2. If unconfirmed by the Supplier in 20 minutes, 3. Create a Voucher and Rebook (if current hotel has inventory) or Relocate by Booking at a near by hotel. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type  to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in they are lowering the number of nights they will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 5. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).

fields.__EMPTY_1: Incorrect  dates or modifying dates
fields.__EMPTY_2: If the issue is the dates: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct dates. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).  (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the dates to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary.

Ask the guest to email the receipt of the charge to Reservations@HotelPlanner.com for reimbursement. 3. If the hotel refuses all changes and requires a new reservation, confirm with the front desk the property has availabitlity if we rebook the guest for the correct room type, once the hotel confirms they do, request a cancellation on the existing room for FOC to rebook the guest, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Advise the guest you will rebook them for the correct room if the guest agrees, create a voucher and rebook them for their preferred room type. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 6. If the guest declines support then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 7. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise them of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).

Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).  (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred policy or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. 6. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property and provide it to the guest to request a free cancellation.

fields.__EMPTY_1: Cancelling Non Refundable
fields.__EMPTY_2: If a guest is requesting to cancel a non refundable room type (reasons why we would process are agent error, hotel closure or unable to accept the guest, unpredictable or dangerous weather conditions, death, flight cancellations, medical, emergencies, gesture of goodwill due to the hotel's exception). 1. Check to see if the reservation has RPP, if yes offer to email the claim link to the client or the guest can receive 100% voucher immediately. If the guest denies the voucher please reach out to the hotel to see if we can obtain a waiver. 2. Call the hotel and request FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. If you are unable to obtain FOC, ask the hotel for a waiver minus one night (for multi nights), if it's still denied then we can offer the guest the option to add a name so a friend or family member can use the room. If none of these options are acceptable we would offer 100% voucher or 50% refund. Make sure the guest is aware the hotel is denying the refund in case they would like to contact the hotel directly for a full waiver. If you do obtain FOC then note the request accurately and completely. Then process a refund via the Refund Queue for the amount you were able to get waived. Advise the guest of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). Do not refund the RPP.

fields.__EMPTY_1: Reservation not found at check-in
fields.__EMPTY_2: 1. Call Supplier, 2. If unconfirmed by the Supplier in 20 minutes, 3. Create a Voucher and Rebook (if current hotel has inventory) or Relocate by Booking at a near by hotel. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type  to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in they are lowering the number of nights they will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 5. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).

fields.__EMPTY_1: Incorrect  dates or modifying dates
fields.__EMPTY_2: If the issue is the dates: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct dates. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).  (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the dates to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary.

fields.__EMPTY_1: Cancelling Non Refundable
fields.__EMPTY_2: If a guest is requesting to cancel a non refundable room type (reasons why we would process are agent error, hotel closure or unable to accept the guest, unpredictable or dangerous weather conditions, death, flight cancellations, medical, emergencies, gesture of goodwill due to the hotel's exception). 1. Check to see if the reservation has RPP, if yes offer to email the claim link to the client or the guest can receive 100% voucher immediately. If the guest denies the voucher please reach out to the hotel to see if we can obtain a waiver. 2. Call the hotel and request FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. If you are unable to obtain FOC, ask the hotel for a waiver minus one night (for multi nights), if it's still denied then we can offer the guest the option to add a name so a friend or family member can use the room. If none of these options are acceptable we would offer 100% voucher or 50% refund. Make sure the guest is aware the hotel is denying the refund in case they would like to contact the hotel directly for a full waiver. If you do obtain FOC then note the request accurately and completely. Then process a refund via the Refund Queue for the amount you were able to get waived. Advise the guest of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). Do not refund the RPP.
